step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance as instructed.
Excellent! You're opening your hand and fingers wide. Remember to focus on the stretch.
Great job opening your hand wide. Keep relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize that lymph flow!
Second rep, great job maintaining the overhead stretch and feeling the resistance.
Perfect! Keep opening your hand and fingers wide. You're doing great with this step.
Nicely done relaxing your hand and muscles. Remember to exhale during this part.
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling, exhaling as you relax. Keep visualizing the lymph flow.
